review.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
review.author: JohnDoe
review.content: The Witcher 3 is an amazing game with a vast open world, captivating story, and rich characters. The graphics are stunning, and the gameplay is immersive. Highly recommended!

review.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
review.author: JaneDoe
review.content: Red Dead Redemption 2 sets a new standard for open-world gaming. The attention to detail is incredible, and the story is gripping from start to finish. A masterpiece!
